"},{"text":"Menacing Goblins","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"During a Menacing Goblins event, golden sword wielding goblins will spawn.

These goblins have more health than normal zombies and can track players from a far distance."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.menacing_goblins.1"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Goblins wear a pumpkin with Thorns III.

Goblins will steal diamonds, iron ingots, and gold ingots from nearby players.

When killed, they will drop most of the items they stole, along with some rotten flesh, iron nuggets, and golden nuggets."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.menacing_goblins.2"}]}]
